Section.Text: The registration number assigned to the unit by the Minister under subsection 7(3) of these Regulations.
The name, civic address and telephone number of the responsible person.
The auditor’s name, qualifications, civic address, telephone number, email address and, if any, fax number.
The procedures followed by the auditor to assess whether

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the responsible person’s use of the CEMS complied with the quality assurance plan referred to in section 6.1 of the CEMS Protocol; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the responsible person complied with the CEMS Protocol and the CEMS met the specifications set out in the CEMS Protocol, in particular those set out in sections 3 and 4 of the CEMS Protocol.

Section.Text: A statement of the auditor’s opinion as to whether

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the responsible person’s use of the CEMS complied with the quality assurance plan referred to in section 6.1 of the CEMS Protocol;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the responsible person complied with the CEMS Protocol and the CEMS met the specifications set out in the CEMS Protocol, in particular those set out in sections 3 and 4 of the CEMS Protocol; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: the responsible person complied with subsection 18(2) of these Regulations.

Section.Text: A statement of the auditor’s opinion as to whether the responsible person has ensured that the quality assurance plan has been updated in accordance with sections 6.1 and 6.5.2 of the CEMS Protocol.
The registration number assigned to the unit by the Minister under subsection 7(3) of these Regulations.
The following information about the unit:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: an indication of whether the unit is subject to an exemption, under subsection 14(1) of these Regulations, from the application of subsection 9(1) of these Regulations for the calendar year that is the subject of the report;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: an indication of whether a declaration of net supply has been submitted in accordance with subsections 14(2) to (4) of these Regulations with respect to the facility where the unit is located;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: an indication of whether the unit generated electricity during a deduction period during the calendar year that is the subject of the report;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: an indication of whether the unit was designated as a substitute unit under section 32 of these Regulations for the calendar year that is the subject of the report and, if so, the following information:

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: with respect to the unit for which it is being substituted,

Clause.Label: (A)
Clause.Text: the registration number assigned to that unit by the Minister under subsection 7(3) of these Regulations,

Clause.Label: (B)
Clause.Text: electricity generation capacity of that unit,

Clause.Label: (C)
Clause.Text: the electricity system operator for that unit, and

Clause.Label: (D)
Clause.Text: an attestation, dated and signed by the responsible person for that unit or its authorized official, that the responsible person agrees to the substitution,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: an explanation of how the conditions set out in subsection 32(1) of these Regulations were met,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: the information referred to in subsection 32(2) of these Regulations, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: the date on which the unit became a substitute unit and, if applicable, the date it ceased to be one.

Section.Text: The unit’s emission limit for the calendar year that is the subject of the report, determined in accordance with section 9 of these Regulations.

The net supply, for the calendar year that is the subject of the report, from the facility where the unit is located and the values determined for Qt, Qr, Qa, Qna and Qec in subsection 13(2) of these Regulations, expressed in GWh, that were used to calculate that net supply.
The following information about the quantity of CO2 emissions attributed to the unit for the calendar year that is the subject of the report:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the value determined for E in accordance with subsection 12(1) of these Regulations, expressed in tonnes;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: with respect to the quantity of CO2 emissions from the combustion of fossil fuel in the unit (Eu),

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: if the quantity is determined in accordance with section 15 of these Regulations, that quantity, expressed in tonnes, and, if section 17 of these Regulations applies to the unit, the values determined for Qu,j, HHVu,j, Qi,j, HHVi,j and E in that section, expressed in the applicable units of measurement, used to determine the quantity of CO2 emissions attributed to the unit,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: if the quantity is determined in accordance with section 16 of these Regulations, that quantity, expressed in tonnes, as well as

Clause.Label: (A)
Clause.Text: the values determined for Ecomb, Vff, Qi, Fc,i, HHVi, VT and ES in subsection 16(1) of these Regulations, expressed in the applicable units of measurement, and

Clause.Label: (B)
Clause.Text: if section 17 of these Regulations applies to the unit, the values determined for Qu,j, HHVu,j, Qi,j, HHVi,j and E in that section, expressed in the applicable units of measurement, used to determine the quantity of CO2 emissions attributed to the unit,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: if the quantity is determined in accordance with section 19 of these Regulations, that quantity, expressed in tonnes, as well as

Clause.Label: (A)
Clause.Text: the values determined for Ei and Es in that section, expressed in tonnes,

Clause.Label: (B)
Clause.Text: the values determined for Vf, CCA, MMA, MVcf, Mf, CCi and Qi in subsections 20(1) and (4) of these Regulations, expressed in the applicable units of measurement,

Clause.Label: (C)
Clause.Text: the values determined for Vtotal and VRNG in subsection 20(2) of these Regulations, expressed in m3 at standard conditions, and

Clause.Label: (D)
Clause.Text: with respect to the data used to determine the value of CCA in subsection 20(4) of these Regulations, an indication of the standard or method, including use of a direct measuring device, used to measure the carbon content of fuel samples or composite samples, as the case may be, or if the carbon content of a fuel was provided by the supplier of the fuel, an indication of the methods used to measure the carbon content of the fuel samples or composite samples, as the case may be;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: if applicable, the following information about the quantity of CO2 emissions attributed to the production of useful thermal energy by the unit (Eth):

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the quantity determined in accordance with section 21 of these Regulations, expressed in tonnes, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the values determined for Hpnet, houti, Mouti, hinj and Minj in section 21 of these Regulations, expressed in the applicable units of measurement;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: if applicable, the following information about the quantity of CO2 emissions attributed to electricity generated by the unit that is used internally at the facility (Eint):

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the quantity determined in accordance with section 22 of these Regulations, expressed in tonnes, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the values determined for Gint, GF and GU in section 22 of these Regulations, expressed in GWh;

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: if applicable, the following information about the quantity of CO2 that is captured from the unit and stored in a storage project (Eccs):

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the quantity determined in accordance with subsection 23(1) of these Regulations, expressed in tonnes,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the values determined for Ecap and Ein in subsection 23(1) of these Regulations, expressed in tonnes, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: information demonstrating that the CO2 was captured, transported and permanently stored in accordance with subsection 23(2) of these Regulations;

Paragraph.Label: (f)
Paragraph.Text: if applicable, the following information about the quantity of CO2 emissions from the production of the hydrogen, ammonia or steam used by the unit to generate electricity (Eext):

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the quantity determined in accordance with section 24 of these Regulations, expressed in tonnes, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the values determined for Ek, Pk and Qk in section 24 of these Regulations, expressed in tonnes, m3 or GJ, as applicable; and

Paragraph.Label: (g)
Paragraph.Text: if applicable, the following information about the quantity of CO2 emissions attributed to the unit for each deduction period (Eec):

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the quantity determined in accordance with section 27 of these Regulations, expressed in tonnes, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the values determined for Eu, Eth, Eint, Eccs and Eext in subsection 27(1) of these Regulations, expressed in tonnes.

Section.Text: If biomass was combusted in the unit during the calendar year that is the subject of the report,

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: an explanation of how the combusted material is biomass as defined in subsection 2(1) of these Regulations; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the quantity of biomass combusted, expressed in m3, kL or tonnes, as applicable, during that year.

Section.Text: If a CEMS was used to measure CO2 emissions from the unit during the calendar year that is the subject of the report, a copy of the CEMS report referred to in subsection 18(3) of these Regulations.

If, in order to determine the value of Vf in paragraph 20(1)(a) of these Regulations, a volume was claimed for VRNG in subsection 20(2) of these Regulations, the following information in relation to each producer of renewable natural gas supplied to the unit during the calendar year that is the subject of the report:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the name of each person from which the natural gas containing renewable natural gas that was produced by the producer was purchased;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the producer’s name, civic address, telephone number and email address;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: the name, civic address and geographic coordinates (latitude and longitude), expressed in decimal degrees to five decimal places, of the facility where the renewable natural gas was produced;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: information demonstrating that the renewable natural gas was kept physically separated from any other substance and was clearly identifiable as renewable natural gas from the time it was produced until the time it was injected into a North American pipeline network;

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: a map that indicates

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the location where the producer injected the renewable natural gas into a North American pipeline network or, if the producer is not directly injecting the renewable natural gas into a North American pipeline network, a description of the location where the renewable natural gas is no longer kept physically separated and is no longer clearly identifiable as originating from the producer and the location where the renewable natural gas is injected into a North American pipeline network,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the location of the unit, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: the pipeline network into which the renewable natural gas was injected and from which it was supplied to the unit;

Paragraph.Label: (f)
Paragraph.Text: the volume of renewable natural gas produced by the producer that was injected into a North American pipeline network during the calendar year; and

Paragraph.Label: (g)
Paragraph.Text: information demonstrating that the conditions referred to in paragraphs 20(3)(e) and (f) of these Regulations are met.

Section.Text: The following information about each deduction period during the calendar year that is the subject of the report:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a description of the irresistible emergency event or risk to human health and safety referred to in paragraph 25(1)(a) of these Regulations, including

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: an indication of whether the electricity system operator determined that there was an irresistible emergency event or whether the Minister determined that there was a risk to human health and safety,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the date on which and hour at which the event or risk began and, if applicable, the date on which and hour at which it ended,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: a description of how the event or risk led to a disruption or significant risk of disruption to the electricity supply in the province in which the unit is located or in a contiguous province or state,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: in the case of an irresistible emergency event,

Clause.Label: (A)
Clause.Text: an indication of whether the event was natural and, if so, details of the event,

Clause.Label: (B)
Clause.Text: an indication of whether the event arose from human action and, if so, the identity of the person whose actions resulted in the event and an explanation of how the event was outside the control of both the electricity system operator and the responsible person for the unit, and

Clause.Label: (C)
Clause.Text: an indication of whether the event led to a disruption or a significant risk of disruption to the electricity supply and an explanation of the disruption or risk,

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: the province or state in which the event or risk occurred, and

Subparagraph.Label: (vi)
Subparagraph.Text: the province or state in which the disruption or significant risk of disruption to the electricity supply occurred;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the date on which and hour at which the deduction period began and ended or, if the deduction period has not ended, an indication to that effect;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: information demonstrating that the unit was directed by the electricity system operator to generate electricity due to an event or risk referred to in paragraph 25(1)(a) of these Regulations;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: the date on which the Minister was notified that a direction referred to in paragraph 25(1)(d) of these Regulations was given; and

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: if an application for an extension of the deduction period was submitted to the Minister under section 26 of these Regulations,

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the date on which the application was submitted to the Minister,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: an indication of whether the extension was granted, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: if the extension was granted and the deduction period has ended, an indication of the reason that the deduction period ended.

Section.Text: The following information for the calendar year that is the subject of the report:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the difference between the emission limit for the unit determined in accordance with subsection 9(1) of these Regulations and the value determined for E in accordance with subsection 12(1) of these Regulations;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: an indication of whether the unit became subject to an emission limit under subsection 9(1) of these Regulations on or after July 1 of that calendar year; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: an indication of whether the unit meets the conditions for the issuance of transferable compliance credits set out in subsection 31(1) and 32(3) of these Regulations and, if so, an explanation of how the conditions are met.

Section.Text: If replacement data referred to in section 35 of these Regulations was used during the calendar year that is the subject of the report, the total number of hours for which replacement data was used during the calendar year and the following information about the replacement data that was used for each given period during the calendar year:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the reason why the data required to determine the value of a variable in a formula referred to in these Regulations was missing for a period of the calendar year and an explanation of how that reason was beyond the responsible person’s control;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the variable for which data was missing and the date on which and hour at which the period during which replacement data was used began and ended; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: the value determined for the variable referred to in paragraph (b), along with details of that determination, including

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the replacement data used to make that determination,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the method used to obtain that replacement data, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: in the case of a determination referred to in subsection 35(3) of these Regulations, an explanation of why a particular equivalent period was used as the basis for determining the value of the variable.

Section.Text: The registration number assigned to the unit by the Minister under subsection 7(3) of these Regulations.
The following information for the calendar year that is the subject of the report:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the values determined for E, Coff and Cc in accordance with subsection 12(1) of these Regulations, expressed in tonnes;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: for each collection of compliance credits that have the same characteristics and that are being remitted for the purposes of subsection 12(1) of these Regulations,

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the total number of tonnes of CO2 that the credits represent,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the calendar year for which the credits were issued,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: an indication of whether the credits are non-transferable or transferable,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: the registration number, assigned by the Minister under subsection 7(3) of these Regulations, of the unit for which the credits were issued, if it is a unit other than the unit that is the subject of the report, and

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: an indication that the credits meet the conditions for remittance set out in subsection 33(2) of these Regulations;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: the maximum number of Canadian offset credits that may be remitted, determined in accordance with section 28 of these Regulations;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: for each collection of Canadian offset credits issued under subsection 29(1) of the Canadian Greenhouse Gas Offset Credit System Regulations that have the same characteristics and sequential serial numbers and that are being remitted for the purposes of subsection 12(1) of these Regulations,

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the total number of tonnes of CO2 that the credits represent,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the first and last serial number of the credits,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: the year in which the greenhouse gas reduction or removal for which the credits were issued occurred,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: the date on which the credits were issued, and

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: an indication of whether the credits are being remitted in accordance with subsection 28(5) of these Regulations and, if so, an indication that the conditions set out in that subsection are met; and

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: for each collection of Canadian offset credits recognized under subsection 78(1) of the Output-Based Pricing System Regulations that have the same characteristics and sequential serial numbers and that are being remitted for the purposes of subsection 12(1) of these Regulations,

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the total number of tonnes of CO2 the credits represent,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the province or program authority referred to in subsection 78(1) of those Regulations that issued the credits,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: the date of retirement of the credits or the date on which the credits were designated by the province or program authority for the purposes of remittance under these Regulations,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: the first and last serial number of the credits,

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: the start date of the project for which the credits were issued,

Subparagraph.Label: (vi)
Subparagraph.Text: the year in which the greenhouse gas reduction or removal for which the credits were issued occurred,

Subparagraph.Label: (vii)
Subparagraph.Text: the offset protocol applicable to the project for which the credits were issued, including the version number and publication date,

Subparagraph.Label: (viii)
Subparagraph.Text: the name of the verification body that verified the credits, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ix)
Subparagraph.Text: an indication of whether the credits are being remitted in accordance with subsection 28(5) of these Regulations and, if so, an indication that the conditions set out in that subsection are met.

Section.Text: The following information about compliance credits:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: for compliance credits issued for the unit,

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the number of non-transferable compliance credits issued for each calendar year,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the number of non-transferable compliance credits that have been remitted under these Regulations and the calendar year for which they were remitted,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: the number of non-transferable compliance credits that have not been remitted,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: the number of transferable compliance credits issued for each calendar year,

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: the number of transferable compliance credits that have been remitted for the unit under these Regulations and the calendar year for which they were remitted, and

Subparagraph.Label: (vi)
Subparagraph.Text: the number of transferable compliance credits that have not been remitted for the unit and have not been transferred to another unit;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: for each collection of transferable compliance credits that have the same characteristics and that have been transferred to the unit,

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the calendar year for which the credits were issued,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the total number of tonnes of CO2 that the credits represent,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: the registration number, assigned by the Minister under subsection 7(3) of these Regulations, of the unit from which the credits were transferred,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: a document, dated and signed by the responsible person for the unit from which the credits were transferred, or its authorized official, and the responsible person for the unit to which the credits were transferred, or its authorized official, confirming that both responsible persons agree to the transfer,

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: the registration number, assigned by the Minister under subsection 7(3) of these Regulations, of the unit for which the credits were issued and the electricity system operator for that unit, and

Subparagraph.Label: (vi)
Subparagraph.Text: the calendar year for which the credits were remitted or an indication that they have not been remitted; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: for each collection of transferable compliance credits that have the same characteristics and that have been transferred from the unit,

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the calendar year for which the credits were issued,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the total number of tonnes of CO2 that the credits represent,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: the registration number, assigned by the Minister under subsection 7(3) of these Regulations, of the unit to which the credits were transferred,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: a document, dated and signed by the responsible person for the unit from which the credits were transferred, or its authorized official, and the responsible person for the unit to which the credits were transferred, or its authorized official, confirming that both responsible persons agree to the transfer, and

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: the registration number, assigned by the Minister under subsection 7(3) of these Regulations, of the unit for which the credits were issued and the electricity system operator for that unit.

Paragraph.Text: for each collection of Canadian offset credits issued under subsection 29(1) of the Canadian Greenhouse Gas Offset Credit System Regulations that have the same characteristics and sequential serial numbers,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: the first and last serial number of the credits,

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: the start date of the project for which the credits were issued,

Subparagraph.Label: (vi)
Subparagraph.Text: the year in which the greenhouse gas reduction or removal for which the credits were issued occurred,

Subparagraph.Label: (vii)
Subparagraph.Text: the offset protocol applicable to the project for which the credits were issued, including the version number and publication date, and

Subparagraph.Label: (viii)
Subparagraph.Text: the name of the verification body that verified the credits.

ScheduleFormHeading.TitleText: Notice of Permanent Cessation of Electricity Generation — Information Required

Section.Text: The registration number assigned to the unit by the Minister under subsection 7(3) of these Regulations.
An attestation, dated and signed by the responsible person or its authorized official, that the unit has permanently ceased generating electricity.
The date on which the unit permanently ceased generating electricity.
